Standard#

class abcmodel.land_surface.standard.StandardLandSurfaceInitConds(alpha, wg, w2, temp_soil, temp2, surf_temp, wl, rs=1000000.0, rssoil=1000000.0, cliq=nan, temp_soil_tend=nan, wgtend=nan, wltend=nan, le_veg=nan, le_liq=nan, le_soil=nan, le=nan, hf=nan, gf=nan, le_pot=nan, le_ref=nan, ra=nan)[source]#

Bases: object

Standard land surface model initial state.

alpha: float#

Slope of the light response curve [mol J-1].

wg: float#

Soil moisture content in the root zone [m3 m-3].

w2: float#

Soil moisture content in the deep layer [m3 m-3].

temp_soil: float#

Soil temperature [K].

temp2: float#

Deep soil temperature [K].

surf_temp: float#

Surface temperature [K].

wl: float#

Liquid water storage on the canopy [m].

rs: float = 1000000.0#

Surface resistance [m s-1].

rssoil: float = 1000000.0#

Soil resistance [m s-1].

cliq: float = nan#

Wet fraction of the canopy [-].

temp_soil_tend: float = nan#

Soil temperature tendency [K s-1].

wgtend: float = nan#

Soil moisture tendency [m3 m-3 s-1].

wltend: float = nan#

Canopy water storage tendency [m s-1].

le_veg: float = nan#

Latent heat flux from vegetation [W m-2].

le_liq: float = nan#

Latent heat flux from liquid water [W m-2].

le_soil: float = nan#

Latent heat flux from soil [W m-2].

le: float = nan#

Total latent heat flux [W m-2].

hf: float = nan#

Sensible heat flux [W m-2].

gf: float = nan#

Ground heat flux [W m-2].

le_pot: float = nan#

Potential latent heat flux [W m-2].

le_ref: float = nan#

Reference latent heat flux [W m-2].

ra: float = nan#

Aerodynamic resistance [s m-1].

class abcmodel.land_surface.standard.AbstractStandardLandSurfaceModel(a, b, p, cgsat, wsat, wfc, wwilt, c1sat, c2ref, lai, gD, rsmin, rssoilmin, cveg, wmax, lam)[source]#

Bases: AbstractLandSurfaceModel

Abstract standard land surface model with comprehensive soil-vegetation dynamics.

Parameters:

  • a (float) – Clapp and Hornberger (1978) retention curve parameter.

  • b (float) – Clapp and Hornberger (1978) retention curve parameter.

  • p (float) – Clapp and Hornberger (1978) retention curve parameter.

  • cgsat (float) – Saturated soil heat capacity [J m-3 K-1].

  • wsat (float) – Saturated soil moisture content [m3 m-3].

  • wfc (float) – Soil moisture content at field capacity [m3 m-3].

  • wwilt (float) – Soil moisture content at wilting point [m3 m-3].

  • c1sat (float) – saturated soil conductivity parameter [-].

  • c2ref (float) – reference soil conductivity parameter [-].

  • lai (float) – Leaf area index [m2 m-2].

  • gD (float) – Canopy radiation extinction coefficient [-].

  • rsmin (float) – Minimum stomatal resistance [s m-1].

  • rssoilmin (float) – Minimum soil resistance [s m-1].

  • cveg (float) – Vegetation fraction [-].

  • wmax (float) – Maximum water storage capacity of the canopy [m].

  • lam (float) – Thermal diffusivity of the soil [W m-1 K-1].

abstractmethod compute_surface_resistance(state, const)[source]#
abstractmethod compute_co2_flux(state, const)[source]#
run(state, const, surface_layer)[source]#

Run the model.

integrate(state, dt)[source]#

Integrate the model.
